name: Checkout Add-on for Woo OnePage – Lite
author: AmaderCode Lab

sections.description:
To make user’s instant/quick purchase Checkout Add-on for Woo OnePage – Lite is a awesome Add-on for Woo OnePage Checkout Shop.

Advantages of Woocommerce OnePage Checkout Add-on – Lite

ðŸ‘‰ Easy Installation.
ðŸ‘‰ Instant/Quick/OnPage/Floating Checkout.
ðŸ‘‰ Auto cart item update on the checkout area.
ðŸ‘‰ Coupon apply/remove.
ðŸ‘‰ Shipping automatically calculation.
ðŸ‘‰ Address validation.
ðŸ‘‰ Ajax based action.
ðŸ‘‰ 100% mobile friendly.

Required Plugins

  • WooCommerce
  • Woo OnePage Checkout Shop

Support, Bug Fix, Feature Request

  • Your are always welcome for your feedback and new feature requests for this Checkout Add-on for Woo OnePage -Lite Plugin!
  • Don’t worry to contact us for any problem or need help with Checkout Add-on for Woo OnePage -Lite Plugin through WordPress support center or Help & Info page in the plugin backend panel.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin woo-onepage-checkout.zip file. Extract and upload in your wp-content/plugins folder.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress by clicking ‘Activate’ button below ‘Checkout Add-on for Woo OnePage -Lite’.
    3.Use the OnePage Shop->Settings screen to configure the your affiliate account tag and country.
  3. You are done.
